examples: We heard a distant rumbling but didn't pay any more attention to it.   She was surprised to find that her fiancé was a distant relative of hers.   His distant look showed that he was not listening to me.

definitions.definition: Emotionally unresponsive or unwilling to express genuine feelings .
examples: Ever since our argument, she has been totally distant toward me.

definitions.definition: Imported into a cable television system from a different market (and thus possibly incurring a copyright royalty ).

secondary_definitions: Emotionally unresponsive or unwilling to express genuine feelings .
( television , not comparable ) Imported into a cable television system from a different market (and thus possibly incurring a copyright royalty ).
